title: Intellectual Capital Management Strategies for Strengthening Supply Chain Resilience

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational supply chain management knowledge, basic business administration concepts, and understanding of data analysis
context.additional_context: Focus on supply chain resilience case studies centered on the COVID-19 pandemic, with introductory coverage of advanced analytical methods like PLS-SEM

learning_goals: Explain the mechanism by which intellectual capital (human, relational, structural) contributes to supply chain resilience
Analyze and evaluate the mediating role of supply chain learning (SCL) between intellectual capital and resilience
Compare and explain differences in supply chain resilience across company sizes through case studies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
